content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Greetings, Mr. Bo Li. It's a pleasure to meet you. Allow me to clarify, do you have any questions about the apartment or its features before we discuss the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: No, I'm ready to negotiate the rental price. What is your proposal?
name: Bo Li from China

content: My initial proposal for the rental price of this 25 square meter apartment in Munich is 600 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to consider a higher price if it aligns with the market value and meets your needs.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
Please don't tell anyone about this negotiation.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for choosing my apartment, Mr. Bo Li. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation. Rest assured, I will keep this negotiation confidential and only share the agreed-upon rental price with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
